body.name: As Seen On TV BluTiger Seated Elliptical Machine - Burn Calories While Working, Reading & Watching TV - Large Pedals - Digital Display - Easily Assembles in Minutes - All Fitness Levels
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: Get Fit Fast! BluTiger is disrupting the at-home fitness industry with its innovative seated elliptical machine! The compact design fits virtually anywhere in your home so you can have a power-packed workout while enjoying your favorite seated activities
Endorsed by Harley Pasternack: BluTiger is endorsed by Harley Pasternack, Hollywood’s #1 trainer to the stars!

Just Take a Seat & Move Your Feet: when you exercise with BluTiger, you’ll be able to enjoy your favorite seated activities while getting an incredible workout! This seated at-home elliptical machine engages muscles in your legs, core, and chest.

Low Impact & Easy on Your Knees: unlike running on the treadmills, BluTiger delivers a low-impact workout that’s easy on your knees. It’s perfect for folks of all fitness levels and a great option for anyone having difficulty during high-impact workouts.

8 Levels of Magnetic Resistance: turn up the dial to increase the intensity of your workout and push yourself to the next level! Just starting out? Start at the lowest setting and gradually increase resistance to burn calories and build and strengthen muscle!

Low Profile Design: BluTiger’s low profile design lets you workout virtually anywhere! Use it at the table, in your favorite chair, or while sitting on the couch. It even fits under your desk so you can shed calories and tone muscle while you work.

Digital Display: track your workout progress with the built-in digital display! You can track your calories burned, distance, speed, or time on the elliptical. Use the SCAN feature to cycle through all the options.

Fluid Motion & Large Pedals: BluTiger’s fluid motion makes it that much easier to pedal. It was designed to give you the best riding experience possible and it’s so easy to use. With large pedals, BluTiger can fit virtually any shoe size.

Carry Handle: easily transport BluTiger around your home or the office with the built-in carry handle. The large grip fits comfortably in your hand so you can move it from the couch to your desk, to your bedroom easily!
Product Dimensions: 20 ⅜-inches X 12 ¾-inches X 11 ⅛-inches; Weight 14-pounds
body.description: No More Excuses The number one reason people say they don’t exercise is, “I don’t have enough time!” No more excuses. BluTiger lets you work out anywhere and anytime without taking time away from your favorite activities. Ultra-Convenient Use BluTiger under your desk or in front of your comfy chair while reading or watching TV. It’s a power-packed workout that is ultra-convenient to use. Get Fit Fast BluTiger has 8 settings so you can start at the beginner level and work your way up. You get a great cardio workout, burn calories, build muscle tone, boost your energy, and even improve joint function and flexibility. Start getting in better shape today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy on knees
reviews.reviewText: I’m 79 and this was super easy to set up and it’s very lightweight. Only like I think 15 pounds and it works well in the recliner works well and regular chairs works well all over the place and I’ve got very bad knees and a bad back and I think this is going to be very helpful. I bought a refurbished one and it’s just perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little exercise machine.
reviews.reviewText: This neat little exercise machine was easy to assemble, seller provided very clear diagrams, and it is working smoothly. I can feel the results already, after just 3 half hour sessions. Best of all, OUR AMAZON DRIVER DELIVERED IT TO THE FRONT DOOR DESPITE THE HEAVY SNOW AND TREACHEROUS ICY ROADS. It does make a loud clicking noise in operation. The instructions just says it tells you 'distance', not what measure of distance. I had pedaled for 38 minutes at resistance 2, distance said 2.6. I assumed that meant miles. Called customer service for info, customer service rep ( with a very heavy Asian accent) said distance meant inches. 38 minutes to go 2.6 inches? Nonsense. It must mean miles. Customer service rep clearly does not understand English.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a good product, but be sure to buy a mat to go under it if you have hardwood floors, or it will not be stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to transport
reviews.reviewText: I use this machine to get daily exercise I do not usually get at my age of 87 years. My legs feel so good after using. I like that it is easy to move from one location to another. Foot pedals were very hard to install. Other than that, very pleased with the machine and enjoy using it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars should have done a little more research on these ellipticals.
reviews.reviewText: the first one I bought the petals were stripped. I sent it back no problem. Amazon sent one out the very next day. this one went together nicely I had no problem with putting that one together. but the resistance is not working it doesn't make a difference if it's on one or two or 10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 1 - Assembly was straight forward2 - Instructions were clear3 - Unless you are sitting at the perfect height, you can forget about a comfortable workout. Works best when you are in a chair and NOT in a recliner4 - Floor pads got torn within 2 days and then it would keep slipping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There's a Tiger under my Home office desk !
reviews.reviewText: simple to assemble works great. Still slides forward albeit almost negligibly, even though a couple things are included to help it not to. Im finding as I use it more & increase my endurance, that the highestcnumber resistance is not quite all that great, still I donot regret my purchase of this at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift and it was just the right gift for my mother in law. 😁

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it. It’s so easy to use. Easy to move around. 1 million times better than a stationary bike
reviews.reviewText: I just love this machine and I hate exercise. It’s a keeper

The product is exactly what is shown in Amazon. I bought this for office use. As I am a hardware engineer, I move from equipment to equipment to perform my daily task. I choose this because it’s the lightest under the desk elliptical that I can find. Purpose is to move around easily. For the resistance level, it is not as strong as Deskcycle Ellipse, which I bought it for home use.As for the quietness, one has to make sure the wheels are clear from any dirt e.g. small sticker, that itself could create unwanted sound.Overall, 👍.

This is replacement #3 for the ‘perfect’ under-desk elliptical that suffered an unfortunate and fatal miscommunication.For my needs, size is of paramount importance. This is a very compact model and fits beautifully into the limited space under my desk.It is quite light. I have it seated on a foam mat on a vinyl floor. Unfortunately, it’s lack of heft means that it travels more than I would like. It does, however, come with reversible foot pads for carpet or flooring. If I forgo the mat and flip the feet, I will likely resolve this issue. Given the likelyhood that local dust and dog hair will render the stickiness of the ‘floor’ version of the foot pads useless in short order, I am not quite ready to go there yet.There is not a considerable difference between settings 1 and 8. I have used an elliptical under my desk for many years, so I may actually have achieved such benefit as to not notice what a novice might. I have it set on the 8th level of resistance and would liken it to that of a 13 year old daughter: I can feel the burn after a few minutes, but it’s not yet painful.What is quite different from models 0 thru 2 is the angle of the pedals. They are closer to a solid 45* as opposed to the lesser 30* of the others. I am finding this to be quite stressful on both shins and calves, but am very much enjoying the increase in stretch.The only non-resolvable issue with this unit is the scant heel guard on the pedals. The curve of my shoe is higher than the lip at the back of each pedal and my feet tend to slip off regularly.Alas, I will either simply attach a small block to the back of each pedal to keep my heels in check, or develop the (currently flaming) thigh muscles to adapt. Time will tell.All in all, unless I ever manage to find an available model #0 to replace the original perfection, this is the keeper.

reviews.reviewTitle: Noisy at times, and it moves
